fields.name: Farm Animals
fields.description: Large domestic animals traditionally kept on farms, including grazing and working animals rescued or cared for at the sanctuary.

fields.name: Poultry
fields.description: Domesticated birds commonly kept on farms for eggs, breeding, or companionship.

fields.name: Small Pets
fields.description: Animals often kept in homes as companions, including small mammals and domestic pets.

fields.name: Wildlife
fields.description: Native and wild animals rescued from injury, abandonment, or unsafe environments.

fields.name: Reptiles
fields.description: Cold-blooded animals that often require specialist care, typically rescued from unsuitable living conditions.

fields.name: Birds
fields.description: Non-poultry birds rescued or cared for at the sanctuary, including exotic and companion species.
